outputs.output_descr: Increase use and promotion of CSH (Concentrating Solar Heat) systems for low and medium temperature process heat applications. It is expected to enhance the solar concentrator - renewable energy source in this sector five-fold  from what was earlier. The intervention is expected to enhance capabilities of Indian entrepreneurs involved in manufacturing and disseminating solar concentrators and expected to benefit small scale manufacturers and small scale industrial units significantly.

project_descr: Market Development and Promotion of Solar Concentrator based Process Heat Applications in India.
project_title: Solar Concentrator for Process Heat Industries
